sourcesContent:
<template>

</template>

<script>
import { AgChartsVue } from 'ag-charts-vue3';
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex';

import pdfMake from 'pdfmake';
import pdfFonts from 'pdfmake/build/vfs_fonts';
import htmlToPdfmake from 'html-to-pdfmake';

export default {

  components: {
    'ag-charts-vue': AgChartsVue,
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      options: null,
      event: {

      }
    };
  },

  methods: {
    createChart() {
      this.options = {
        data: [
          { label: 'За', value: this.event.voteFor},
          { label: 'Против', value: this.event.voteAgainst },
        ],
        series: [
          {
            type: 'pie',
            angleKey: 'value',
            calloutLabelKey: 'label',
            calloutLabel: {
              minAngle: 0,
            },
            center: ['200%', '15%'],
            offsetCenter: ['100%', '25%'],
            sectorLabelKey: 'value',
            sectorLabel: {
              color: 'white',
              fontWeight: 'bold',
              fontSize: 17,
            },
            fills: ['#FF0000', '#0000FF'],
            highlightStyle: {
            item: {
              fillOpacity: 0,
              stroke: '#000',
              strokeWidth: 3,
              },
            },
          },
        ],
        legend: {
          enabled: false,
        },
     };
    },

    getEvent() {
      this.event = this.EVENTS[this.$route.params['id']-1]
    },


  created() {
    this.createChart()
  },

  mounted() {
    this.getEvent()
    this.createChart()
  },
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.chart {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
}
</style>
